review.title: “A professional SME with precisely defined policies, mission and vision, aiming to be in the league of top consultants.”
review.pros: Pros – Excellent work environment and a better paymaster in comparison to the industry basis. KNR promotes professionalism more than anything else and since its establishment, talent has always been given importance than other resources.
